## Summary
- What changed?
- Why?

## Validation
- [ ] `pnpm lint`
- [ ] `pnpm typecheck`
- [ ] `pnpm test` (or explain why skipped)

## Risk Notes
- Any migration, compatibility, or operational risks?

## Checklist
- [ ] Updated docs/contracts if behavior or APIs changed
- [ ] No secrets, local artifacts, or generated files committed
- [ ] Added/updated tests or provided rationale
